document_data.name: Kuo Te' Lung
document_data.mainbody: '''Kuo Te' Lung''' was the capital of [[Shou Lung]] around [[1357 DR]], housing the fabled [[Forbidden City]].<ref> It was in [[Wang Kuo]] province.<ref>
